notifText.message:
One or more $EXT$ streams detected.
Use the right-click context menu to copy the URL.

notifIncompCopiedText.message:
Stream URL copied in plain form due to lack of compatibility with the chosen tool.
Use of youtube-dl is recommended.

extText.message: Formerly known as HLS Stream Detector. Detects M3U8/MPD/F4M/ISM playlists used by HLS/DASH/HDS/MSS streams. Assembles readymade youtube-dl (recommended)/FFmpeg/Streamlink commands.

buttonTitle.message: Copy URLs by clicking on them in the context menu (right click on web page) or clear the list by clicking on this button.
